Description.Text: The AMBASSADEUR (V) is a Tourist hotel. Located in Moi Avenue area. and the nightlife/restaurants are easily accessible by taxi or bus from the hotel.

Group oriented six-story hotel (1962) located in city center, 1 mile from train station, 3 km from Game Park, 10 km from airport, air conditioned rooms with bath, phone, balcony, rooms for nonsmokers, wheelchair access, Safeer most famous Indian restaurant on premises, grill room, cocktail bar, snack bar, meeting facilities to 135, business center, laundry. Renovations in 1993.
